from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1
from mqtt import *
from machine import RTC
import ntptime
import time
from aiot_lcd1602 import LCD1602
from event_manager import *
from aiot_rgbled import RGBLed
from machine import Pin, SoftI2C
from aiot_dht20 import DHT20
import music
from aiot_ir_receiver import *

aiot_lcd1602 = LCD1602()

event_manager.reset()

tiny_rgb = RGBLed(pin0.pin, 4)

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__led_(led_input):
  global fan_input, F_flag, temp, timer1, priority, humidity, mutex_block, PASS, ADMIN, light, STATUS, refresh, i, ABSTRACT_PASS
  if led_input == '1':
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#ffffff'))
  else:
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#000000'))

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__fan_(fan_input):
  global led_input, F_flag, temp, timer1, priority, humidity, mutex_block, PASS, ADMIN, light, STATUS, refresh, i, ABSTRACT_PASS
  pin10.write_analog(round(translate((int(fan_input)), 0, 100, 0, 1023)))

# Mô tả hàm này...
def _C4_90_C4_83ng_K_C3_AD_K_C3_AAnh():
  global led_input, fan_input, F_flag, temp, timer1, priority, humidity, mutex_block, PASS, ABSTRACT_PASS, ADMIN, light, STATUS, i, refresh, aiot_dht20, aiot_lcd1602, aiot_ir_rx, tiny_rgb
  mqtt.on_receive_message('led', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__led_)
  mqtt.on_receive_message('fan', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__fan_)

def on_event_timer_callback_U_t_E_r_i():
  global led_input, fan_input, F_flag, temp, timer1, priority, humidity, mutex_block, PASS, ADMIN, light, STATUS, refresh, i, ABSTRACT_PASS
  if priority == 0:
    time_acknowledgement()

event_manager.add_timer_event(30000, on_event_timer_callback_U_t_E_r_i)

def on_event_timer_callback_Y_X_n_U_C():
  global led_input, fan_input, F_flag, temp, timer1, priority, humidity, mutex_block, PASS, ADMIN, light, STATUS, refresh, i, ABSTRACT_PASS
  if priority == 0:
    dot_processing()

event_manager.add_timer_event(2000, on_event_timer_callback_Y_X_n_U_C)

def on_event_timer_callback_J_g_P_t_i():
  global led_input, fan_input, F_flag, temp, timer1, priority, humidity, mutex_block, PASS, ADMIN, light, STATUS, refresh, i, ABSTRACT_PASS
  if priority == 0:
    send_data_to_server()

event_manager.add_timer_event(30000, on_event_timer_callback_J_g_P_t_i)

# Mô tả hàm này...
def pump_processing():
  global led_input, fan_input, F_flag, temp, timer1, priority, humidity, mutex_block, PASS, ABSTRACT_PASS, ADMIN, light, STATUS, i, refresh, aiot_dht20, aiot_lcd1602, aiot_ir_rx, tiny_rgb
  pin16.write_digital((1))
  time.sleep_ms(3000)
  pin16.write_digital((0))

# Mô tả hàm này...
def timer_interrupt():
  global led_input, fan_input, F_flag, temp, timer1, priority, humidity, mutex_block, PASS, ABSTRACT_PASS, ADMIN, light, STATUS, i, refresh, aiot_dht20, aiot_lcd1602, aiot_ir_rx, tiny_rgb
  if timer1 <= 0:
    F_flag = 0

aiot_dht20 = DHT20(SoftI2C(scl=Pin(22), sda=Pin(21)))

# Mô tả hàm này...
def send_data_to_server():
  global led_input, fan_input, F_flag, temp, timer1, priority, humidity, mutex_block, PASS, ABSTRACT_PASS, ADMIN, light, STATUS, i, refresh, aiot_dht20, aiot_lcd1602, aiot_ir_rx, tiny_rgb
  aiot_dht20.read_dht20()
  temp = aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature()
  humidity = aiot_dht20.dht20_humidity()
  light = round(translate((pin2.read_analog()), 0, 4095, 0, 100))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(temp)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(4, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('*C')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(6, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('  ')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(8, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(humidity)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(10, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('%')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(11, 0)

def check_danger():
  global led_input, fan_input, F_flag, temp, timer1, priority, humidity, mutex_block, PASS, ABSTRACT_PASS, ADMIN, light, STATUS, i, refresh, aiot_dht20, aiot_lcd1602, aiot_ir_rx, tiny_rgb
  if temp >= 28 and temp < 45:
    pin10.write_analog(round(translate(70, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  else:
    pin10.write_analog(round(translate(0, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  if temp >= 45 or humidity <= 30:
    mutex_block = 1
    aiot_lcd1602.clear()
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Warning !!!')
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Possible fire')
    music.pitch(1000, 1000)
    time.sleep_ms(1000)
    music.pitch(850, 1000)
    time.sleep_ms(1000)
    pump_processing()
    mutex_block = 0
    refresh = 1
  if light <= 35 or (int(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[4])))) >= 18:
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#ffffff'))
  else:
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#000000'))

aiot_ir_rx = IR_RX(Pin(pin1.pin, Pin.IN)); aiot_ir_rx.start();
